worker_description.description: Peasants perform basic work like harvesting resources, hauling stuff around and constructing buildings - but can also farm simple crops.

worker_billhook.description: Allows a Peasant to harvest better crops and is also a decent weapon.

worker_pitchfork.description: Primarily used as a farming tool but works alright as a weapon.

worker_torch.description: Get them! Get them! Set them on fire!

worker_billhook_recipe.description: This tool allows a Peasant to harvest (but not plant) any kind of crop unlocked by the Farmer instead of just basic crops.
worker_billhook_recipe.flavor: It's also rather decent as a weapon!

peasant_kitchen_recipe.description: Can be used by peasants to prepare daily meals with simple ingredients.
peasant_kitchen_recipe.flavor: Peasant Kitchens are used automatically every morning and peasants will only try to use ingredients that are available

temperate.description: Forests, rivers and mountains. Default home of the Ascendancy+.

peasant_kitchen.description: Used by peasants to prepare their daily and simpler meals.

empty.description: Requires some lower grade fuel to be used.

pumpkin_soup.description: Very warm and delicious, a great homemade meal!

porridge.description: Very filling and sweet meal to start off the day.

meat_stew.description: Nutritious and warm, a homemade delicacy!

fish_stew.description: Has a funny smell... But it should be good enough!

bread.description: Still warm and ready to be eaten!

preparation.description: Being used by a peasant to prepare some food...
